comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Another Bain naming error. Tell Schirnding Berna (1891-1975) was an American athlete who competed in the 1912 Olympics. He was a member of the 3000m team that won the gold medal. He's in Wikipedia.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
whyaduck:

Thanks for the tip. We'll make the fix to his name and add more information about Mr. Berna to the descriptive data.
